entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:27 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.4°C

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
